full_text: OMB #1115-0064 U.S. Department of Justice Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 Expires 3/31/84 Immigration and Naturalization Service Notice of Preliminary Naturalization Hearing Naturalization and Citizenship Branch B 300 NORTH LOS ANGELES STREET File or A # 21 207 655 Date 2/09/1983 LOS ANGELES, CA 90012 You are hereby notified to appear for a hearing on your (your child's) application for naturalization at the DATE, TIME, AND PLACE, shown below. Date 3/07/1983 Time 8:40 AM BACHCHI THI NGUYEN 5026 COYOTE LANE SAN BERNARDINO, CA 92407 Place 300 NORTH LOS ANGELES STREET LOS ANGELES, CA 90012 FEDERAL BUILDING - DOWNTOWN ROOM-NUMBER: 8010 You MUST BRING the following with you: - This letter, with the Personal Description Form on the REVERSE SIDE COMPLETELY FILLED IN. Alien Registration Receipt Card. MICHAEL M. LANDON, JR. Any evidence of Selective Service Registration. Any documents you have which you used in connection with any entries into the United States. DISTRICT DIRECTOR Those items noted on the reverse side of this letter which are applicable to you. Filing Fee. $25.00 CASH ONLY (NO COINS). 3 IDENTICAL PHOTOS LIGHT BACKGROUND, FRONT VIEW OF HE D TO POINT OF CHIN) TAKEN 30 DAYS PRIOR TO ST INTERVI W. Please KEEP this APPOINTMENT even if you do not have all the items noted above or those on the back. However, you MUST bring the Filling Fee. Form N-430A IMPORTANT - PLEASE SEE REVERSE
